body.name: Amazon Basics Memory Foam Mattress, Soft Plush Feel, 6 Inch, Twin, White/Grey
features: Plush-feeling memory-foam layer adapts to the contours of the body and comfortably conforms to different sleep positions
Twin-size memory-foam mattress with 3 foam layers for optimal softness and support
Item's dimensions: 75" W x 39"L x 6"H. Item's weight: 18.91 lbs.
A safe mattress to sleep on: Certipur-US certified foam, safe and quality foam and Oeko-Tex certified top fabric.
The middle soft foam layer has breathable air holes, which allow air to circulate inside the mattress
Hard foam bottom layer provides durability, stability and enhanced body support. This layer also provides airflow thanks to its wavy surface.

Please allow up to 72 hours for the mattress to decompress and for any potential odor to dissipate. We recommend removing all bed sheets from the mattress and letting it air out in a well ventilated space

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable 10" mattress
reviews.reviewText: I have been sleeping on this for almost a week now and it is definitely a plush type mattress.I was concerned about previous ratings about being too firm, it definitely isn't! I am both a side and back sleeper, either position is comfortable. I am waking up rested and my back feels good, no stiffness. 10/10 would recommend this to others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for your money
reviews.reviewText: I can't say enough good things about foam mattresses! My sleep quality has improved significantly since I switched to one. The comfort and support they provide are unmatched. It's like sleeping on a cloud that perfectly contours to my body. I wake up feeling refreshed and pain-free, which is a game-changer. Plus, the durability and hypoallergenic features are a bonus. Foam mattresses are a fantastic investment in my sleep and well-being.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very high quality mattress and very comfortable! Above all expectations at this price
reviews.reviewText: I've bought a LOT of mattresses, including the expensive ones (Nectar, Avocado, Sleep Number) and bought one of Amazon's mattresses for our guest room, not wanting to spend a ton. I was really pleasantly surprised and the quality of this mattress as well as the comfort, which rivals the above! It is also Certi-pur and I believe Oeko-Tex certified, which was very reassuring! The smell when you open the package is expected for memory foam, but this was very mild and aired out within the first day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very firm memory foam
reviews.reviewText: This was a very firm memory foam. If you are looking for firmness, this is perfect. If you are looking more for Cush, this is not the mattress for you. After I bought it, I tried the foam instead of my mattress, and it was just too hard to sleep on. So what I did was put it between my mattress in my box springs to give me movement and Kush underneath my mattress. I’m pretty satisfied with that. Just remember if you want firm this is perfect. If you want Cush, this is not the mattress for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: If you like a firm mattress, this one is for you. It’s almost a little bit too firm for us, but that is such a subjective comment. It pretty much means nothing to you. The edges are good and strong, you can sit on the edge and put your socks on without it getting crunched down real badly. We have this on a metal Frame also purchased here on Amazon and it is working out quite well. Have not slept on it during the summer yet, so I cannot attest to if it’s cool to sleep on or not. But so far we are liking it and it was a good value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Considering the price this the best option and it’s very comfortable, it does have a weird smell the first week though

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was disappointed with this mattress but didn't want the hassle of trying to return it. If I did I would be stuck in the same position of having to order another one which probably wouldn't be any better (possibly worse) and then dealing with that. I can't afford to go to a mattress store, and I still might not know without trying it out in comfortable clothes and all my pillows etc. I'm very picky, I have a difficult time being comfortable in general, so take this with a grain of salt, but personally this was so much worse than my last one (had it 10 years and was happy with it for 9), which I also ordered on Amazon for roughly the same price, but they don't carry it anymore. I tried a memory foam mattress topper which I hoped would improve the old mattress, but it causes me to sink too much in the middle and hurt my back (and still isn't soft enough not to put pressure on my hips). It did the same thing on the new mattress as well, so that was a bust. I got a pillow topper and that is helping a bit. But I still dream of the new bed I had last time. Super soft, cradles everything evenly, and still supports your body so your spine is straight (side sleeper). Anyway this is at least supportive enough. It's probably fine for most people. Nothing special.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for this price
reviews.reviewText: Excellent for night relief, soft foam on the top, heavy foam on the bottom
Al quitar el forro del colchon descubrí que el colchon tenia muchas manchas y agujeros, como si hubiera sido usada previamente
Although I haven't had it for very long, this has to be the most comfortable mattress I've ever owned. So far, so good!

reviews.reviewTitle: Take a screen shot or copy of the original offer before ordering
reviews.reviewText: Product looks great but I was supposed to receive a mattress pad free of charge with the order but didn't get it and when I talked to customer service they said they didn't see it in the order and disconnected would have been nice to get a sorry I'm not able to help you instead of just disconnecting.
Really soft perfect for me and my girlfriend ( we weigh less than 150 pounds each) the only complaint i would have is that it retains a lot of heat )
